titleStmt.title: Thomas E. Bramlette to Edwin M. Stanton
CWG1518

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Military Correspondence, 1863-1867

body.p:
UNITED WE STAND, DIVIDED WE FALL.
KENTUCKY.
Commonwealth of Kentucky,
EXECUTIVE DEPARTMENT,
Frankfort, Oct 13th 1863.
Hon Edwin M Stanton
Secty of War Washington
The 13th Ky Cavalry was raised for one (1) year to meet guerillas The term of service not being specified in your telegram the A. C. M. wishes special orders sent to me for mustering them -- Answer.

Tho E Bramlette
Govr of Ky
I have Copy present for office
